snippet.title: Lenny's Music Toons (PC, 1993)
snippet.description: Lenny's Music Toons is a point and click PC game from 1993 inside Lenny the penguin's New York apartment. with several different music themed minigames. The game has several different music themed minigames including jigsaw puzzles, card matching, and a war themed game on Mars, Earth, and Toyland where you fight off invaders by playing specific notes on a piano. This war music game was by far my favorite when playing this game growing up, and the later levels get really challenging. There is also a MTV themed music video maker.
